mapper.select: SELECT r.*, m.member_nickname FROM review r INNER JOIN member m ON r.member_email = m.member_email ORDER BY r.review_id DESC

SELECT r.review_id, r.review_title, m.member_nickname, r.review_star, r.review_content, r.review_regdate, r.review_cnt, r.review_like, r.review_hate, m.member_email, ri.origin_file_name, ri.file_name FROM review r LEFT OUTER JOIN review_img ri ON r.review_fileid = ri.review_fileid LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON r.member_email = m.member_email WHERE r.review_id = #{review_id}
